sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，樹莓，櫻桃和李子的芬芳濃郁，呈醬紫色。

sentences.english: Processing technology of red raspberry beverage and color stability were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對樹莓清汁飲料的加工技術及色澤穩定性進行了研究。

sentences.english: Thought to be the ancestor of todays popular Bramble cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 被認爲是當今流行樹莓類雞尾酒的鼻祖。

sentences.english: Blueberries are a favorite of many people, but blackberries and raspberries are also great choices.
sentences.chinese: 藍莓是許多人的最愛，而黑莓和樹莓也是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: San Simeon Cabernet Sauvignon offers bright aromas of raspberry and black cherry.
sentences.chinese: 聖西蒙赤霞珠提供了樹莓和黑櫻桃明亮的香味。

sentences.english: Gala Christmas in the Brach candy berries.
Has a rich wild raspberry, black cherry, raspberry aroma.
sentences.chinese: 有着濃郁得野樹莓，黑櫻桃，覆盆子的香氣。

sentences.english: Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，樹莓，櫻桃和李子的芬芳濃郁，呈醬紫色。

sentences.english: There was no embryonic dormancy of the Rubus seeds used in this study.
sentences.chinese: 研究所採用的樹莓試材種子均不存在胚性休眠。

sentences.english: Fruity old rose scent with raspberry notes.
sentences.chinese: 果味老玫瑰香味與樹莓筆記。

sentences.english: Sweet jammy raspberry and blackberry, vanilla, and graphite aromas.
sentences.chinese: 甜樹莓和黑莓果醬，香草，石墨香。

sentences.english: Avoid fruits with small seeds like raspberries.
sentences.chinese: 不要給寶寶喫帶有籽的水果，比如像樹莓。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
